short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Company Inclusion tracking platform, making your job search more rewarding

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your career and focus on inclusive companies where you can become a member of a winning team, doing meaningful work with equal pay.

happy hive exists to help you find these companies.

Support your job search on Linkedin or Indeed and discover the happy hive rating. The rating will let you know:

- how many women work in leadership roles
- how many women work in tech roles
- Is the company growing
- Do they track pay equity
- Do they offer training programs
- Do they offer mentorships
- Are they recognized for outstanding employer achievements
 
At happy hive we believe that if you can see it, you can be it. So, come and join us to make finding work, better.

Lovingly made in Toronto, Canada
